name: Zron lightbike races
description:
Game is an upgraded copy of the Tron arcade minigame from the 80s.

It has three game modes arcade, frenzy and multiplayer.

In arcade mode you have three coins and if you use up all you coins you lose.

Frenzy mode is about staying alive as long as possible.

Multiplayer mode is about racing against another person.

Made as part of Xamk Gamejam by team Vagabound.

Game jams theme was Arcade.
